info.author: Leandro Lameiro
info.description:
GNota is a gradebook software used to manage students and automate score
calculations. gNota has some basic student data archiving (such as Phone Number,
notes about academic or behavioral problems, missed classes) and an advanced
score calculation system. It can use a variety of score systems (for instance,
A-F or 0-100) and implements various average algorithms (arithmetic average,
weighted averages, average of best N scores).
info.name: GNota
